fullProfile.summary: * Current CEO, Admin, Consultant for GO SMART MEDIA ~ http://goSmartMedia.com (SEO Subscription Packages, Manage Digital Marketing Campaigns for Canadian Clients) * Current Web Master with Cape Breton Web Design ~ http://CapeBretonWebDesign.com (Web Design, SEO Services, Social Media Marketing Services) * Internet Communications Manager @ The Old Sydney Society ~ Lyceum at 225 George St, Sydney, NS (Web Design, Events Creation, Social Media Management) * Current Web Designer with Halifax Web Design ~ http://HalifaxWebSolutions.com (Web Design, SEO Services, Social Media Management) * Current Project Manager and Web Developer with SlightlySocial.com (Gaming, Web Development, Mobile Apps, Press Releases, Article Writing) Contact: support@webdesigncapebreton.com Phone: 902 304-1302 Specialties: Web Design, SEO (search engine optimization), Social Media, Social Media Marketing, Facebook Branding, Twitter Design, WordPress Design, Content Writing, Internet Marketing, Article Writing Services, Video Testimonial Creation services, Backlinks Building, PHP, Database Development
fullProfile.active_experience_description: If you have been looking for a local Digital Marketing Specialist in Atlantic Canada to Create Authority Content for your Brand and Market your website through Creative SEO and Social Platforms, than you are in luck! Go Smart Media, a Google Partner, is a local Web Development, SEO, and Digital Marketing Company based in Nova Scotia helping clients across Canada boost their online presence on major search engines including Google. If you want to get found online for your products or services, talk to an experienced Digital Marketer in Atlantic Canada that is technical, knowledgeable and affordable! GoSmartMedia.com is the #1 SEO Services Company in the Halifax, Moncton, Saint John, PEI, and Cape Breton that has proven success for clients in a variety of markets. Go Smart Media can boost your Google Page Rank for your market to #1 for it's specific keyword phrases in any given market. We partner with our clients through monthly web management and SEO Subscription Packages using a variety of creative and “white hat” SEO methods that are proven tried and true, and Google Partner approved! Getting Started – FREE SEO ANALYSIS http://gosmartmedia.com/free-seo-analysis Simply Choose a WEB MANAGEMENT / SEO Package That Will Help Get You Found in Local Search Engines ahead of your competition for your marketing and keywords. We know you are too busy to do Website Updates, Security, Web Optimization, and look after all your Social Media Channels, so that's where we come in! Hire a Digital Marketing Specialist today to work with your team or as a Web Management Firm - support@gosmartmedia.com | 1-888-736-2382 GoSmartMedia Digital Marketing Services Phone: (888-SEO-2382) 1-888-736-2382 Email: support@gosmartmedia.com Website: https://gosmartmedia.com

recommendations.recommendation:
As the Information Systems Lead at Marconi Campus, I work closely with many of the IT students. I consider Tom to be one of the most studious and responsible students I've had the pleasure to work with. After two years, I have come to know him well and would recommend highly.

Tom is a dedicated member of the community and has donated countless hours of his time and talents to many worthwhile causes. He has not only worked with members of the community, but assumed leadership roles as needed, with high developed skills in both IT and music.

In my opinion, Tom's unwavering devotion to his community exemplifies strong moral fiber and character. He is a trustworthy individual and would be an excellent addition to any team.

Sincerely, 

Shawn Bigley
Information Services Lead
Marconi Campus, NSCC

Tommy has given back in many ways by Volunteering for the Cape Breton Sub Chapter of the Children's Wish Foundation!!  He has been a great help for making Our Wish Children's Dreams come true!!  Thank you!

report.executiveSummary: Identified 1-person buyer group for openprisetech.com ($150,000 deal) with 37% cohesion score. Group includes 0 decision maker(s), 1 champion(s), and comprehensive cross-functional coverage. Research methodology validated 1 final members from 9 initial candidates.

stages.name: Company Intelligence
stages.description: Database-first company research with Coresignal API fallback

stages.name: Wide Preview Search
stages.description: Cross-departmental employee discovery using Coresignal Preview API

stages.name: Smart Scoring
stages.description: Multi-dimensional scoring: seniority, influence, champion potential, cross-functional ability
stages.result: Top candidates identified before expensive collect API

stages.name: Role Assignment
stages.description: Deal-size-aware role assignment ensuring Decision Maker + Champion
stages.result: Appropriate roles assigned based on deal size

stages.name: Cross-Functional Validation
stages.description: Stakeholder completeness validation across all relevant functions
stages.result: Missing stakeholders added for comprehensive coverage

stages.name: Full Profile Collection
stages.description: Coresignal Collect API for final buyer group members only
stages.result: Complete profiles for final buyer group

buyerGroupJustification.name: Tom Mills
buyerGroupJustification.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
buyerGroupJustification.detailedReasoning: Promoted to champion (no better candidate found)
buyerGroupJustification.justification:
**Tom Mills (Digital Marketing Specialist) - CHAMPION**

**Operational Leadership**: **Advocacy Potential**: Marketing leaders champion tools that improve lead generation and conversion.

**Selection Criteria**:
- Seniority Score: 3/10
- Influence Score: 2/10
- Network Size: 500 connections
- Role Confidence: 36%

recommendations: Add IT stakeholder for technical implementation
Add Security/Legal stakeholder for risk management
Add Finance stakeholder for budget approval

cohesionAnalysis.reasoning: Limited reporting proximity; Limited functional interdependence
recommendations: Consider adding members who report to same executives
Consider adding members from interdependent functions
Overall cohesion could be improved with better stakeholder selection

championAnalysis.analysis: Moderate champion potential - consider additional advocates

recommendations: Consider improving buyer group cohesion through better stakeholder selection
Ensure primary business functions are represented
Critical: Add appropriate decision maker for deal size
Consider adding more stakeholders for comprehensive coverage

cohesion.reasoning: Limited reporting proximity; Limited functional interdependence
recommendations: Consider adding members who report to same executives
Consider adding members from interdependent functions
Overall cohesion could be improved with better stakeholder selection
